text: − The Men's pentathlon 2 was one of the events held in Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics in Heidelberg. There were 5 competitors in the event. Josef Jager of Austria won the gold medal. ==Results== ===Final=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" !Rank !!Athlete !! title: Athletics at the 1972 Summer Paralympics – Men's pentathlon 2
